pma:database.name: humanr
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `logs` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `date_in` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `date_out` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `tabel` int(11) NOT NULL, `view` int(11) NOT NULL, `id_user` int(11) NOT NULL, `form` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_user` (`id_user`), CONSTRAINT `logs_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_user`) REFERENCES `useri` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `rules` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_level` tinyint(11) NOT NULL, `view_form` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_level` (`id_level`), CONSTRAINT `rules_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_level`) REFERENCES `levels` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `useri` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `username` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `pass` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `id_level` tinyint(4) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `id_level` (`id_level`), CONSTRAINT `useri_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_level`) REFERENCES `levels` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
